column5: Simon invited Miss Kelly and I out on lake Ontario for some fishing. We met up with him in pt credit at 5:30am Thursday, and the lake was like a sheet of glass. We started out hunting down the salmon, and I was not disappointed.  Chinook   When that slowed down we went out further for the Rainbows, again I was not disappointed.     Thanks Simon!
Sounds like a super day for you guys. WTG!
Nice catch!! Nothing better than being out on the lake & catching fish! thanks for the report
Good to see you boys had fun. Ideal weather too. Nice catch too guys
Is the hat lights part of the secrets to succes? Great shirt Dann. THanks for getting him out fishing pike slayer.
Looks like a perfect day of fishing out there, great stuff
nice day on the big O

Hey Dann, What are you doin in the city? It was a great day!! Great company and great weather. It would of been nice to boat more fish, but at least you added more inches for team 2..  :wallbash:  Cheers

I have had the pleasure of spending a bit of time with Pikeslayer, you were in good company! John and I have a date coming up to hit lake O with him very soon! Really looking forward to it! Super report! Thanks.
